dogecoin.text: @TimothyPorritt2 @dogecoin_rise And why shouldn't they buy it?
@yallaretrash_ @jaymanmason @jeremiah_inkosi @dogecoin_rise We have to see the situation in the coming weeks. Let's see what the big billionaires will do.
@redditinvestors It is wrong to ask this question. DogeCoin is a coin like all others, forget the current moment, let's hold onto the dogecoin and let's fly to the moon.
@yallaretrash_ @jaymanmason @jeremiah_inkosi @dogecoin_rise Just think that the DogeCoin will be the people's currency that everyone can afford. Bitcoin will be difficult for everyone to buy.
@albodden @dogecoin_rise 20, 25 dollars is a feasible price but at the same time difficult, but not impossible. The primary goal is to start at one dollar and go up gradually.

@yallaretrash_ @jaymanmason @jeremiah_inkosi @dogecoin_rise I do not think so. The price of Dogecoin will go up, that's for sure, we are facing a historic moment of growth where billionaires are trying to grow this coin. However, it is difficult to say that its value will rise too much, it will gradually rise but it will not replace BTC.

@TimothyPorritt2 @dogecoin_rise I want to hope that we will have the balance when the value of the DogeCoin is high enough that it will allow us to earn. I think everyone agrees that its value will rise, especially for the big billionaires.
@Roxy8113 @dogecoin_rise exactly like that, people have to try and not chat too much.

@ESavsa @dogecoin_rise But remember that it is a coin with millions of capitalization in circulation, the fact that Elon Musk is pumping hype to make it go up may mean that even he has invested in this cryptocurrency.
